column4: 1. Internal Auditor Certification is not an internal test. Proficiency requirement: certification from a reputed agency
2. L-2 proficiency level if candidate scores between 60-80% in the basic level test for the respective competency area
3. L-3 proficiency level if candidate scores more than 80% in the basic level test for the respective competency area

column1: Can work independently and train others
column4: 4. L-4 proficiency level if candidate scores more than 60% in the advanced level test for the respective competency area

column1: Can supervise as a team leader
column4: 5. Proficiency level in competencies marked in RED colour are mandatory for the respective roles
